title: For the Love of Par
description: Professional golfer, Stacie Thomas, can certainly find her way around a golf course making pars, birdies, eagles and even an occasional hole in one. However, when it comes to men, all she can do is make double bogies. Then she meets up with her youngest brother’s best friend, Dirk Dixon, whom she hasn’t seen in ages and wonders when he grew up to be such the most gorgeous man ever. There is an instant spark, but she feels hesitant because she doesn’t want to ruin their friendship if things don’t work out. Should she take a chance?Dirk Dixon, sports anchor for NBC, meets up with Stacie Thomas while covering her LPGA Open. He has always had a crush on her but knows she only thinks of him as her little brother’s best friend. How can he get Stacie to see the man he has grown into and to take him seriously?
author: Lois L. Kasznia
